laboratory_examinations.findings: WBC 20K, thrombocytopenia, mildly elevated ALP, TBili normal, LFTs WNL.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: C. difficile toxin A & B test
laboratory_examinations.findings: Feces negative for C. difficile toxin A & B by EIA. (Reference Range-Negative).

Heart size is upper limits of normal, prominent pericardial fat, blunting of the left CP angles (consistent with known pleural effusion), likely atelectasis at the lung bases, no signs for overt pulmonary edema or focal consolidation.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Comparison is made to the prior CT abdomen and pelvis.
